content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Electricity Generator at position (0, 0)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine (position not specified)
- Boiler (position not specified)
- Offshore Pump (position not specified)

### Copper Plate Mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position not specified) and a Furnace (position not specified)
- Burner Mining Drill (position not specified) and a Furnace (position not specified)
- Burner Mining Drill (position not specified) and a Furnace (position not specified)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available before attempting to operate furnaces or other crafting machines.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Errors with crafting limits
- Check the crafting limits of your machines and ensure you have enough resources to craft the desired items.
